articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Participants in Meeting of Officials of Chongryon Chapters
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Participants in Meeting of Officials of Chongryon Chapters
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Friday sent a message of greeting to the participants in the meeting of officials of chapters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Kim Jong Un said in the message:
					
					 The meeting serves as an important occasion for preserving the immortal feats Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in the movement of Koreans in Japan and providing a bright future of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan along with the socialist homeland.
					
					 It was thanks to devoted efforts made by the officials of Chongryon chapters, who have become the roots supporting Chongryon and the community of compatriots, that Chongryon has been able to hold high the banner of the Juche idea and play the pioneer role in the movement of overseas Koreans despite the alternation of century and generations.
					
					 I pay a high tribute to elder activists of the chapters and patriotic compatriots who devoted their whole life to the road of patriotism, and extend warm thanks to officials of all the basic organizations of Chongryon including the chairmen of chapters who have defended the posts of the movement of Koreans in Japan that require display of patriotism following in the footsteps of forerunners without expecting any honor or comfort.
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan face honorable tasks to hold in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as eternal sun of our nation, uphold the Juche-based idea and cause of overseas compatriots' movement with loyalty and usher in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 You should keep step with the dynamic advance of the people in the motherland to a final victory, make a tangible contribution to hastening the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and the cause of building a thriving nation and create a favorable condition for the improvement of the DPRK-Japan relations and the activities of Chongryon by deepening friendship with the Japanese people.
					
					 We will set store by Chongryon, the patriotic heritage of Juche, protect it in every way and do utmost effort for the dignified life and bright future of Chongryon officials and other Koreans in Japan.
					
					 I firmly believe that the meeting will mark an important occasion in opening up a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan by injecting vitality into the activities of Chongryon as a whole, and wish the meeting good success.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Colombian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Colombian President
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greeting to Juan Manuel Santos, president of Colombia, on its independence day.
					 Kim in the message wished the president good health and greater success in his work and Colombian people prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Belgian King
articles.content:
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Belgian King Albert II on the national day of the country.
					 The message hoped for prosperity of the Belgian people.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Colombian FM
articles.content:
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Friday sent a message of greeting to Colombian Foreign Minister Maria Angela Holguin on the Day of Independence of Colombia.
					 The message wished the Colombian foreign minister success in the work for developing good relations with other countries, expressing belief the friendly relations between the two countries will further develop.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Thai Delegation
articles.content: Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, had a friendly talk with the Thai Foreign Ministry delegation led by Deputy Permanent Secretary Nuttavudh Photisaro which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Denounces U.S. Hostile Act
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Denounces U.S. Hostile Act 
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued a statement Friday condemning the U.S. for going extremely reckless in prodding the south Korean puppet regime to such hideous act as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. It said:
					 As already reported, a man who infiltrated into the DPRK to demolish a statue and monument in the DPRK, holy ones for its people, under the back-stage manipulation of the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime was arrested.
					
					 His testimonies proved that the U.S. is being deeply involved in the conspiratorial plan which the south Korean regime worked out by putting to use defectors to south Korea.
					
					 This is a token of the extremely vicious act of hostility against the DPRK prompted by the intention to stir up the people's mindset, break the single-minded unity and overthrow its social system in the end, a vivid expression of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. rallies hostile elements of the countries which incur its displeasure and prods them to the actions of undermining and disturbing those countries and uses the ensuing social confusion as pretexts for military interference and war of aggression.
					
					 It is a typical method the U.S. has employed in recent years to overturn social systems in other countries.
					
					 It is an open fact that the U.S. has a special item in its state budget to fund the conspiratorial organizations against the DPRK every year to escalate the anti-DPRK psychological warfare and the operation to disturb it.
					
					 The envoy of the U.S. State Department for the human rights issue in north Korea who visited south Korea in mid-June this year announced that the U.S. would offer 10 million U.S. dollars to the conspiratorial bodies active for the "disturbance of north Korea" this year.
					
					 It is not just co-coincidental that the terrorist was arrested in the DPRK soon after the announcement. 
					
					 This incident is just a simple example of sabotage against the DPRK being conducted by the U.S. Even at this moment, the hostile elements bribed by the U.S. are hatching the second and third conspiratorial plans according to the U.S. scenario.
					
					 The hostile act aimed at demolishing the statues of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu amounts to the most undisguised insult to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and the mental mainstay of its people, and physical attack on it. Thus it is a war action as serious as the armed invasion.
					
					 The prevailing situation proves that the U.S. has totally backtracked from the main points of the October 12, 2000 DPRK-U.S. joint communique in which it stated that it has no hostility toward the DPRK as well as those of the September 19 joint statement in which it confirmed its stand not to attack or invade the DPRK and promised to respect the DPRK's sovereignty and co-exist with it in peace.
					
					 Recently the U.S. authorities are often saying that it has no intention to take any act of hostility against the DPRK, but the situation clearly shows that the U.S. DPRK policy to antagonize its idea and social system and stifle it remains unchanged.
					
					 The consistent hostile policy towards the DPRK pursued by the U.S. is giving rise to the evil cycle of confrontation and tensions on the Korean Peninsula, making the prospect of denuclearizing the peninsula all the more gloomy.
					
					 The situation compels the DPRK to totally reexamine the nuclear issue.
					
					 Without the U.S. fundamental repeal of its hostile policy toward the DPRK first, it will be completely impossible to settle the issue of ensuring the lasting peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Pomminryon Denounces S. Korean Regime's Moves for Military Agreement with Japan
articles.content:
Pomminryon Denounces S. Korean Regime's Moves for Military Agreement with Japan
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The North and South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) Friday made public a joint statement in denunciation of the south Korean conservative authorities' attempt to sign a military agreement with Japan. 
					 To conclude the military agreement with Japan, sworn enemy of the Korean nation, amounts to unpardonable acts of treachery as it is meant to formally recognize the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" as regular army, encourage Japan to become a military giant and pave the way for its reinvasion, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It is also a revelation of the dangerous attempt of the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea to finally round off the preparations for a nuclear war against the north by establishing the triangular military alliance at the instigation of the U.S. 
					
					 Lee, steeped in pro-Japanese sycophancy, and his conservative regime are traitors similar to the "five traitors in 1905" because they are going to reduce Korea to a colony of Japan again. 
					
					 Japan covered the path of aggression of Korea and other Asian countries and mass-killing a century ago, dreaming of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere". It is still watching for a chance for reinvasion with its nature for aggression unchanged. 
					
					 Pomminryon will resolutely frustrate the traitorous moves for a military agreement with Japan with the might of unity holding aloft the banner of independence against outside forces together with all Koreans. 
					
					 Pomminryon will actively wage a joint struggle against Japan's distortion of history, its claim to Tok Islets and the moves to become a military giant. It will launch stronger struggle to force Japan to make an apology and reparation for all kinds of crimes it committed against the Korean nation in the last century, typically the forceful drafting of Koreans and the issue of comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army. 
					
					 Pomminryon strongly demands the Japanese reactionaries stop at once national discrimination policy and politically-motivated suppression of Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 Japan would be well advised to clearly understand the firm will of the Korean nation to regard its sovereignty and dignity as its life and not to pardon anyone who violates them even a bit. 
					
					 The statement expressed belief that all the Koreans at home and abroad desirous of peace and independent reunification of the country will positively respond to the patriotic call of Pomminryon to defend dignity and sovereignty of the nation.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un 
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages and letters from various countries on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included the general secretary of the C.C., the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the secretary general of the United Malays National Organization of Malaysia, the general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), the chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the president of the Bangladesh People's League, the chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-(Kyrgys El) Republican Political Party, the chairman and the first secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Norway, the chairman of the Communist Party in Denmark, the chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, the chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, the chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union, the chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the chairman of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party, the general secretary of the C.C., the Czechoslovak Communist Party, the general secretary and the international 
					
					 secretary of the C.C., the French Revolutionary Communist League, the chairman, the vice-chairman who is concurrently international secretary and the general secretary of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the spokesman (leader) of the C.C., the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the general secretary of the Unified Communist Party of Italy, the general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, the president of the Socialist Party of Benin, the chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt and the first secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action).
					
					 Similar messages and letters were sent from a member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, a secretary of the C.C., the Slovak Communist Party, a member of the National Executive Committee of the Polish Communist Party, the deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana, the secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council who is also director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, the secretary general of the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People and other high-ranking officials of political, social and economic circles of Russia, Nepal, Malaysia, Myanmar, Mongolia, Bangladesh, Pakistan, Iran, Indonesia, Norway, Denmark, Germany, Switzerland, Sweden, the Czech Republic, Poland, U.K., Austria, Iceland, Italy, Nigeria, Democratic Congo, Uganda, Egypt, Ethiopia, Mexico
					
					 , Brazil, Colombia and Peru and representatives of international organizations, Juche idea study groups and organizations for supporting Korea's reunification and friendship.
					
					 They said that the feats Kim Jong Il performed by developing the WPK into a glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and thereby setting a worldwide example in building a socialist ruling party will shine long.
					
					 They expressed belief that only victory will be in store for the WPK and army and people of the DPRK advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on his elevation to DPRK Marshal.
					 They were handed over to Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Gak, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Friday by Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy here who is doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Performance Given to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Performance Given to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army (KPA) Song and Dance Ensemble gave a performance at the April 25 House of Culture Friday to extend the highest glory and congratulations to Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA.
					 Put on the stage were narrative poem "Highest Glory and Congratulations to Marshal Kim Jong Un," mixed chorus "Glory to Our Great Party", mixed vocal quartet and mixed chorus "Our Leader Beloved by People," female vocal solo "We Will Follow You with One Mind" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the boundless reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the revolutionary armed forces, and extended the greatest glory and warmest congratulations to him, carrying with ardent loyalty of all the service personnel.
					
					 They showed well that the socialist motherland is invincible as there is the matchless military muscle which has been consolidated under the care of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, Hyon Yong Chol, chief of the KPA General Staff, leading officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and service personnel.

articles.title: Conferment of Marshalship to Kim Jong Un Delights People in DPRK
articles.content:
Conferment of Marshalship to Kim Jong Un Delights People in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are delighted at the news that the title of Marshal was conferred on the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 Kim Ha Il, a researcher of the History Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 "This is a great auspicious event for the Korean nation. Upon hearing the happy news, all my family expressed heartfelt thanks to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for having made the Korean people blessed with brilliant commanders through generations.
					
					 The conferment is just appreciation of the great feats Kim Jong Un performed to bolster up the Korean People's Army and the national defence capability with his prominent military idea, strategy and tactics."
					
					 Ho Myong Ho, deputy head of a workshop of the Rakwon Machine Complex, said:
					
					 "I pay my highest tribute to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 His distinguished leadership and matchless guts serve as a sure guarantee enabling our servicepersons and civilians to reliably ensure the security and development of the country from any pressure, blockade and threat by the enemies.
					
					 Bright is the future of the DPRK people rallied close around him."
					
					 Chae Song Mi, a teacher at Samhung Secondary School, said that the Korean people would dynamically advance toward the rosy future, holding high the flag of the Supreme Commander. Only victory is in store for the DPRK led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, she added.

articles.title: Youth and Students Hail Marshal Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Youth and Students Hail Marshal Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the news that the dear respected Kim Jong Un was awarded the title of Marshal, youth and students in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea extend their heartfelt congratulations to him.
					 Choe Jun Gyong, a student of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA:
					
					 "It was thanks to Kim Jong Un, brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu, that the Korean people could turn into courage their bitter grief at the sudden demise of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was always together with Kim Jong Il in guiding the Songun (military-first) revolution as his closest revolutionary comrade-in-arms.
					
					 It was our unanimous desire to confer the title of Marshal to him to whom all the Korean people entrust their destiny. It is also obligation of the Korean people who are descendants of President Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciples of leader Kim Jong Il."
					
					 Sol Ok Gyong, a student of Wonsan University of Agriculture, said:
					
					 "When seeing Kim Jong Un making a congratulatory speech at the military parade celebrating the centenary of the birth of Kim Il Sung, I could hardly repress tears of emotion. His image reminded us of the President in marshal's uniform standing on the platform of square to celebrate the war victory.
					
					 I will study harder to uphold the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un with knowledge."

articles.title: Thai Delegation Flies Back
articles.content:
Thai Delegation Flies Back 
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The Thai foreign ministry delegation led by Deputy Permanent Secretary Nuttavudh Photisaro flew back Friday after visiting the DPRK.

articles.title: Servicepersons Resentful of Attempted Terrorist Crime
articles.content:
Servicepersons Resentful of Attempted Terrorist Crime 
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean regime have made desperate efforts to desecrate the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and disrupt the single-minded unity of its people. 
					 Their moves were disclosed by a defector to the south, Jon Yong Chol, in a press conference held at the People's Palace of Culture here on Thursday. 
					
					 In the press conference Jon confessed his criminal acts in joining the operation to blow up a statue in the DPRK, which was engineered by the U.S. and the south Korean intelligence agencies.
					
					 Ro Tae Il, an officer of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Security Bureau, told KCNA:
					
					 "This is an intolerable politically-motivated terrorist case.
					
					 The case gives a glimpse of the moves launched by the United States and south Korea's Lee Myung Bak to hurt the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					
					 A sledgehammer should be dealt to the human dregs eager to undermine the DPRK's single-minded unity."
					
					 Han Won Guk, an officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					 "The hysteric frenzy whipped up by the U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors to do harm to the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership is tantamount to a declaration of a war.
					
					 Those provokers, including the members of 'statue demolition society' are bound to meet a miserable end.
					
					 We will make revenge upon them through retaliatory sacred war."

articles.title: "Arirang" Program Modified
articles.content:
"Arirang" Program Modified
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", given annually here, has been modified in its program.
					 The performance is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records.
					
					 Its creative group amended the script and performance designs to fully represent all the people stepping up the building of a thriving country under the wise guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Composition and contents of several acts and scenes of the performance have been refined on an ideological and artistic basis. The background, too, has undergone changes, with more than half of its previous contents renewed. And properties and tools used by performers have also been improved.
					
					 The performance will be supported by diverse lighting and sounding devices like laser lighting and extra-large projection screen.
					
					 It takes 80 minutes, consisting of 19 acts and scenes.
					
					 Kim Kum Ryong, senior director of the performance, told KCNA:
					
					 "'Arirang' is considered a hit for its signal contribution to opening a new phase in the development of the world's arts.
					
					 The spectators will experience the Korean nation's wisdom and talent as well as the true picture of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea whose people are dynamically advancing towards a fresh victory, closely rallied around the dear respected Kim Jong Un."

articles.title: Typhoon Hits Some Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Typhoon Causes Human, Material Losses in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The downpour, triggered by the typhoon-7, seriously hit Kangwon and South Hwanghae provinces of the DPRK, causing big human and material losses.
					 In Kangwon Province, the flood left seven people dead, many hectares of farmland inundated and some of dwelling houses, public buildings, railways, roads, bridges, breakwaters, electric supply and communication networks destroyed. Water supply system was paralyzed in Wonsan and Munchon cities, suspending the provision of drinking water to citizens.
					
					 In South Hwanghae Province, several houses were totally or partially destroyed in Haeju City and Jaeryong County and many areas of cropland submerged in Unchon County.
					
					 Meanwhile, the typhoon brought heavy rainstorm and tidal wave to the east coastal areas of the country on July 19.
					
					 Over 200 mm rainfalls were registered in Kim Chaek City, North Hamgyong Province, Munchon City and Chonnae County, Kangwon Province, and Sudong District, South Hamgyong Province. Kim Chaek City witnessed 66 mm of rainfalls from 15:00 to 18:00 and 64 mm from 21:00 to 24:00, Chonnae County 54 mm from 10:00 to 11:00 and 72 mm from 12:00 to 15:00 and Sudong District 52 mm from 09:20 to 11:50 and 69 mm from 12:00 to 15:00.
					
					 That day, a wind measuring over 10 to 18 meters per second swept Wonsan City and Kosong County, Kangwon Province, and Hamhung, Sinpho and Tanchon cities and Riwon County, South Hamgyong Province.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Advancing toward Final Victory under Leadership of Songun Commander
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Advancing toward Final Victory under Leadership of Songun Commander
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The awarding of the title of DPRK Marshal to the dear respected Kim Jong Un is a token of the absolute trust and loyalty of the army and people for the great brilliant commander of Songun. It is also a historic event of great significance in ushering in a new heyday of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea. Rodong Sinmun Friday editorially says this.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK's history is a sacred one in which all the army and people have formed a harmonious whole with the great brilliant commanders of Songun and emerged ever-victorious.
					
					 Only when we hold the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu in high esteem as DPRK Marshal, can we guarantee the eternal victory of the DPRK. This truth will remain unchanged as ever.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's personality as an outstanding and gifted strategist has been well known among the Korean people from long ago. He, who learned military affairs from his early years, provided the Songun revolutionary leadership with leader Kim Jong Il and made a distinguished contribution to increasing the nation's defence capabilities.
					
					 He is the father of the people who has ushered in a new history of loving the people and the future generations with ardent patriotism. 
					
					 Unshakable is his will to take care of the destiny of the country and people which President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il entrusted to him and build on this land a thriving socialist nation in which the desires of the people come true.
					
					 The country and the revolution will remain unfazed by any storm and stress as all the party members, servicepersons, school youth and children and other people are rallied close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They should cherish the great national pride and honor of holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as DPRK Marshal and carry on the dynamic struggle for the bright future and final victory of Songun Korea, the editorial concludes.

articles.title: Politically-Motivated Terrorists Will Meet Punishment: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Politically-Motivated Terrorists Will Meet Punishment: KCNA Commentary 
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Part of terrorism and sabotage against the DPRK by the U.S. and the south Korean regime was disclosed in the eyes of the world.
					 This was recently revealed by a defector to south Korea who was arrested while being engaged in sabotage against the DPRK which was planned by the U.S. and the south Korean intelligence agency.
					
					 The defector had lived in Chongjin City, North Hamgyong Province before betraying his homeland.
					
					 According to him, the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors hatched a criminal plot which baffles human imagination targeting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, and prodded mercenary human scum to action.
					
					 This is the most serious act of hostility toward the DPRK and the most hideous politically-motivated terrorism.
					
					 The projected demolition of statue amounts to a war action as serious as invasion, it being the most undisguised insult to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and the mental mainstay of the Korean people, and physical attack on them.
					
					 The U.S. is the backstage wirepuller of the plan.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime became involved in the "plan" with the U.S. backing and its final approval. 
					
					 Those involved in the plan said that the "Statue Demolition Society", a group of crazy criminals, has been supported by the U.S. and visited the country in June and August last year and that it is losing the U.S. confidence for registering no success. 
					
					 The recently disclosed political terrorist act is just the tip of an iceberg of the U.S. and south Korean regime's conspiratorial plans against the DPRK.
					
					 The international community is stunned by the persistent and vicious smear campaign and sabotage being conducted by the U.S. and other hostile forces against the DPRK.
					
					 Recently there have been reports about the vicious anti-DPRK acts of hostility more openly carried out by the U.S. and south Korean regime.
					
					 The world is now deluged with false "news" about the situation in the DPRK from the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					
					 Their aim is to convince the public that the DPRK has some problem inside and internationalize interference in its internal affairs and thus attain the final aim of overthrowing its social system.
					
					 All facts clearly show how desperately the forces hostile to the DPRK have gone in their moves to break its single-minded unity and stifle it.
					
					 The political terrorists should not misjudge the situation. Even though the earth is broken to pieces, the single-minded unity of the DPRK will never be broken. It is, instead, steadily growing.
					
					 The whole country is now on the highest alert in ideological and mental aspects.
					
					 Impregnable is the line of devotedly defending the leader made up of all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Those who dream of bringing down the DPRK are as foolish as trying to sweep the sea with a broom.
					
					 The group of wicked gangsters without an equal in the world will never be able to escape the stern punishment by the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Rebukes False Rumors about DPRK Leadership
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Rebukes False Rumors about DPRK Leadership
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S., south Korea and other forces hostile toward the DPRK are spreading false rumors as regards the organizational matter dealt with at a meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Taking the lead in the smear campaign are FOX News, CNN, VOA, the New York Times, the Los Angeles Times and other U.S. media and Chosun Ilbo, Dong-A Ilbo, Korean Broadcasting System and other south Korean conservative media.
					
					 They fed the public with misinformation that there is serious power scrambles within the leadership in the DPRK and it has shifted its line from the military-first policy to the party-first policy emphasizing party's control over the army.
					
					 Who is dismissed and appointed in the DPRK is not a matter of concern of other countries.
					
					 The rumors put it that the illness was not the cause of dismissal, a wanton infringement on the state sovereignty by those steeped in bitterness toward the DPRK to the marrow of their bones. The aim is to break the single-minded unity which represents the biggest might of the DPRK, lead it to deviate from the path of its already chosen option and stifle it.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea, timed to coincide with the false rumors, said that "unification under liberal democracy" has drawn near while trumpeting "bigger unified Republic of Korea."
					
					 This is, however, nothing but a daydream.
					
					 The situation in the DPRK proves that there is no change in its stand to keep to the path of Songun, path of independence, pioneered and led by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Unbreakable is the single-minded unity in the country. The army and people of the DPRK have grasped the greatness of the dear respected Kim Jong Un through their experiences. Absolute and boundless is their trust in Kim Jong Un who devotes his all to the people, always considerate of them.
					
					 The change in line and power scrambles touted by the hostile forces are an intolerable insult and challenge to the headquarters of the Korean revolution, the party, state, army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 What is extremely regretful is that some media of those countries around the DPRK have been embroiled in the wicked campaign.
					
					 As the KCNA stated at the recent second world media summit, it is prerequisite for media to strictly abide by the principles of objectivity, impartiality and accuracy, away from prejudice, if they are to live up to their mission as a pace-setter and organizer of the public opinion.
					
					 Individual media of those countries around the DPRK are echoing false rumors with an eye to popularity and "peculiarity". This does not conform to the mission of media which should regard authenticity, impartiality and accuracy as their life and there is no benefit in view of the development of relations between countries.
					
					 They should not be taken in by childish trick of those fools. They should think back if they remained true to the prestige and dignity of media.
					
					 No matter how desperately the hostile forces may hatch cunning plots, they can never check the dynamic advance of the army and people of the DPRK along the path of Juche, rallied close behind Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Time will prove the ridiculous nature of the rumors spread by the anti-DPRK tricksters.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Aim through "Unification Jar" Disclosed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Aim through "Unification Jar" Disclosed
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korea regime is intent on raising "unification" fund from the people through "unification jar."
					 When the "Ministry of Unification" baked the "jar" at a kiln site of North Kyongsang Province, the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors opened a website to give wide publicity to it.
					
					 On July 16 traitor Lee donated his salary, talking nonsense that "unification drew so near."
					
					 The "unification jar" raised by the Lee regime for the purport of raising "unification fund" reflects its dangerous plot to escalate confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is a replica of "unification tax" fabricated by it to build up public opinion over the policy of confrontation between social systems.
					
					 The "unification tax" put forth by Lee in 2010 was bitterly denounced and rebuffed immediately after it was brought up for its potential danger of escalating confrontation.
					
					 The recent "jar" campaign is aimed to realize the regime's scenario to stifle the DPRK without fail.
					
					 It envisions keeping the money in its pocket and thus binding hand and foot the south side organizations and businesses that conduct cooperation and exchange in reliance on the fund and blocking inter-Korean cooperation and exchange.
					
					 To this end, the "Ministry of Unification" proposed "draft amendment to a law on south-north cooperation foundation" the core of which is to create a "unification jar" as a separate thing within the foundation last year, and employed all gamut of ploys to railroad it through the "National Assembly" session.
					
					 Lurking behind the regime's deep concern for the "jar" is an aim to redress its failure in confrontation policy on the verge of total bankruptcy.
					
					 Lee, tightly cornered at home and abroad, is trying to create impression that he is interested in the reunification issue and is whitewashing his bankrupt confrontation policy, while donating to the "jar" though its true colors have already been disclosed. 
					
					 However, with nothing can the Lee regime cover up the nature of confrontation policy against reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on German Internet Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on German Internet Website
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The German MS tourist agency posted on its Internet homepage leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" on July 7.
					 The work, published on August 4, 1997, deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung in the cause of national reunification and formulates the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and sets forth tasks and ways for accomplishing the cause of national reunification on their basis.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Was Greatest Leader in 20th Century: Finnish Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Was Greatest Leader in 20th Century: Finnish Organization
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The Finland-Korea Society (FKS) posted on its Internet homepage an article praising the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung on July 6 on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of his demise.
					 Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK, was the greatest state leader in the 20th century, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The undying feats Kim Il Sung performed for the struggle against imperialism and the U.S. and global independence will go down in history.
					
					 The Juche idea founded by the President serves as an inspiring banner for the Korean people in their efforts for socialist construction, national reunification and progressive mankind's independence.
					
					 Moved by his idea and exploits, many Finnish people extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in their heroic struggle for the country's reunification and the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The FKS is convinced that the Korean people would surely emerge victorious in their just cause to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the country's independent and peaceful reunification under the guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Papers of Bangladesh, Syria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Papers of Bangladesh, Syria
						
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi and Syrian papers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A Bangladeshi paper on July 2 carried an article titled "People's leader", illustrated with photos of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. It said:
					
					 18 years have passed since the President passed away but the Korean people are holding him in high esteem as eternal President of the DPRK. The President, who was born as the son of the people, devoted his whole life to their wellbeing. Regarding it as his maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven, he made sure that the system of free medical care and free educational system were enforced, and turned the DPRK into a country free from tax for the first time in the world.
					
					 The Bangladeshi papers Natun Bangla and Blits on July 6 and 3 carried a special article titled "Eternal reverence" with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 He was awarded orders, medals, honorary titles and gifts from many countries and international and regional organizations even after his demise, the papers said, adding he is enjoying immortality amid reverence of the world progressives.
					
					 The Syrian paper Al Baath on July 8 carried an article titled "Iron-willed commander Kim Il Sung".
					
					 It said that he was the iron-willed commander who liberated Korea by leading the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and defeated the U.S. in the 1950-1953 Korean War for the first time in history.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita participantes en conferencia de Chongryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita participantes en conferencia de Chongryon
						
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion a los participantes en la conferencia de los funcionarios de las sucursales de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon)
					La conferencia sirve de un motivo importante para defender las inmortales hazanas acumuladas por los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en el movimiento de los coreanos residentes en Japon y asegurar el brillante futuro de la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon, subraya la misiva y continua:
					
					Aunque se cambia la generacion, la Chongryon exalta su orgullo de ejemplo vanguardista del movimiento de los compatriotas en el extranjero bajo la bandera de la idea Juche, gracias a los esfuerzos abnegados de los funcionarios de las sucursales, organizaciones de base que apoya la Chongryon y la sociedad de compatriotas.
					
					Expresando sublime homenaje a los activistas veteranos de sucursales y los compatriotas patrioticos quienes dedicaron sus vidas para la patria y la nacion, envio calido agradecimiento a todos los funcionarios de las organizaciones de base de la Chongryon incluyendo los presidentes de las sucursales quienes defienden fidedignamente los puestos patrioticos del movimiento de los coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					Ellos deben abrir la nueva epoca dorada del movimiento de los coreanos en ultramar al enaltecer al Presidente y el Dirigente como eterno sol de la nacion coreana y quedar fieles a la autoctona idea y causa en materia del movimiento de  los coreanos en el ultramar, subraya.
					
					Al compas de la marcha del pueblo de la patria que avanza energicamente hacia la victoria final, los coreanos en Japon deben apoyar de manera especifica en anticipar la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria y la causa de la construccion de un Estado prospero, estrechar las relaciones de amistad con el pueblo japones y preparar el ambiente favorable a la mejora de las relaciones Corea-Japon y las actividades de la Chongryon,  asevera
					
					Enfatiza que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea apreciara y defendera de toda manera la Chongryon, herencia patriotica del Juche y hara todo lo posible para la digna vida y el brillante futuro de los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los coreanos en Japon.
					
					Expresando la confianza de que la presente Conferencia activara mas todas las organizaciones de la Chongryon para servir de un hito para abrir la nueva epoca dorada del movimiento de los coreanos la nota, desea exitos en las labores de la conferencia.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC censura a EE.UU. por instigacion de terrorismo
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC censura a EE.UU. por instigacion de terrorismo
						
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 20 la siguiente declaracion:
					La cada dia mas recrudescente politica hostil de EE.UU. sobre la RPDC se realiza en la etapa extremadamente imprudente de instigar las acciones hostiles especiales tendentes a insultar la maxima dignidad de esta.
					
					Como se informo ya, hace poco fue descubierto y arrestado un elemento hostil que habia infiltrado en la RPDC con el objetivo de destruir nuestra mas sagrada estatua de bronce y el gran monumento conmemorativo bajo el auspicio de EE.UU. y la banda titere del Sur de Corea.
					
					A traves de la declaracion del criminal detenido, quedo esclarecida la verdad de que EE.UU. se intervino en esa conspiracion planeada por la camarilla titere del Sur de Corea instigando a huyentes  norcoreanos al Sur de Corea.
					
					Esto resulta un atentado peor tendente a desviar nuestra opinion publica, desintegrar la unidad monolitica y derrocar al fin nuestro regimen, y la demostracion de la politica hostil de EE.UU. sobre la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. suele agrupar a los elementos malignos de los paises que no le agradan y les instigan a descomponer el interior de estas naciones, y  toma la confusion social como  pretexto de la intervencion militar y la guerra agresiva de las fuerzas extranjeras, lo que deviene el metodo preferido por EE.UU. para derrocar el regimen de otro pais.
					
					Ya esta conocido el hecho de que cada ano EE.UU. inserta los articulos especiales en los presupuestos estatales y suministra enormes fondos a las entidades intrigantes para ampliar de manera escalonada las operaciones psicologicas y de desintegracion del interior de la RPDC.
					
					A mediados de junio ultimo el llamado "enviado especial encargado de los derechos humanos del Norte (de Corea)" del Departamento de Estado norteamericano viajo al Sur de Corea cuando declaro que el imperio ofrecera este ano diez millones US$ a las entidades de conspiracion para fines de "la desintegracion del interior del Norte de Corea".
					
					No es casual que haya sido arrestado un terrorista en la RPDC poco despues del viaje  al Sur de Corea del enviado especial norteamericano.
					
					El presente incidente no pasa de ser un ejemplo de las maniobras de complot anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y ahora tambien los elementos hostiles sobornados  por el dinero de EE.UU. traman otras conspiraciones especiales  segun el guion de EE.UU.
					
					Tales acciones hostiles encaminadas destruir las estatuas de bronce de las grandes hombres sin pares  devienen el insulto mas abierto a nuestra maxima dignidad y el alma de nuestro pueblo y una accion  belica igual a la agresion armada.
					
					Todos los hechos comprueba que EE.UU. revolco completamente el comunicado RPDC-EE.UU. aprobado el 12 de octubre de 2000, segun el cual el imperio declaro  no tener  la voluntad hostil a la RPDC, y los articulos principales de la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre, segun la cual EE.UU. afirmo no tener intencion de atacar ni agredir a la RPDC y ambas partes firmaron el acuerdo de respetar la soberania reciproca y coexistir en paz.
					
					Pese a que en estos dias las autoridades norteamericanas suelen decir que no tienen la voluntad hostil a la RPDC, la realidad muestra que no se ha cambiado nunca la politica hostil de  EE.UU. tendente a odiar la idea y regimen optados por nuestro pueblo y aplastarla a toda costa.
					
					Debido a esta politica hostil de EE.UU. se repiten en la Peninsula Coreana el circulo vicioso de la confrontacion y la agravacion de tension y se dilata mas la desnuclearizacion de esta region.
					
					Todas las condiciones nos obligan reexaminar de manera universal el problema nuclear.
					
					Sin eliminar primero y radicalmente la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC, no se resolvera nunca el problema de asegurar la paz y la estabilidad duraderas de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: APRP condena a autoridades surcoreanas en tema de acuerdo military
articles.content:
APRP condena a autoridades surcoreanas en tema de acuerdo militar
						
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- Las Direcciones Nortena y Surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) publico el dia 20 una declaracion conjunta para denunciar a las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas que vinieron impulsando por la fuerza la firma de acuerdo militar con Japon.
					La firma seria un imperdonable acto traidor a la nacion que significa reconocer oficialmente las "fuerzas de autodefensa" de Japon, enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana, como ejercito regular, tolerar la conversion de este pais en potencia militar y abrirle el paso de reagresion, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					Igualmente, es una muestra del intento agresivo de la banda surcoreana de ultimar los preparativos de la guerra nuclear de agresion al Norte de Corea, al establecer la alianza militar trilateral bajo la instigacion de EE.UU.
					
					Lee Myung Bak y sus compinches, penetrados del servilismo a Japon, son precisamente los "5 traidores de Ulsa" de la actualidad que quieren convertir otra vez a Corea en colonia de Japon.
					
					Japon, que hace un siglo, lanzo la agresion y cometio el genocidio contra Corea y otros paises asiaticos sonando con la "esfera de coprosperidad de gran Asia Oriental", no ha dejado todavia su atributo de agresor y sigue acechando la oportunidad de reagredir.
					
					Al enarbolar en alto la bandera de independencia anti-fuerzas extranjeras con todos los connacionales, la APRP frustrara tajantemente con el poderio de la unidad las pretensiones vendepatrias de firmar el acuerdo militar con Japon.
					
					Ademas, dinamizara la lucha conjunta de diferentes tipos contra la tergiversacion de la historia por Japon, su reclamo por la "soberania de la isla Tok" y sus maniobras para convertirse en potencia militar.
					
					Ademas, intensificara la lucha por hacer a Japon pedir disculpas e indemnizar todos sus crimenes cometidos en el siglo pasado contra la nacion coreana como el arresto forzado y la conversion de coreanas en esclavas sexuales del ejercito japones.
					
					Demandamos fuertemente a los reaccionarios japoneses poner fin ahora mismo a la politica de discriminacion nacional y la represion politica de toda indole contra los coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					Japon debe ver correctamente la ferrea voluntad de la nacion coreana de no perdonar cualquier minimo atentado contra su soberania y dignidad que considera ella como su vida.
					
					Expresamos la esperanza y conviccion de que toda la nacion coreana, que desea la paz y la reunificacion independiente del pais, respondera al llamamiento patriotico de la APRP a defender la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion.

articles.title: Tifon no.7 causa perdidas humanas y materiales en Corea
articles.content:
Tifon no.7 causa perdidas humanas y materiales en Corea
						
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- Las lluvias torrenciales y turbonada ocasionadas por el tifon no.7 dejaron 7 muertos en la provincia de Kangwon.
					Resultaron sumergidas muchas tierras cultivables y destruidos las viviendas, edificios publicos, ferrocarriles, carreteras, puentes, malecones y parte de las redes de suministro electrico y comunicaciones, entre otras perdidas materiales.
					
					En la ciudad de Wonsan y la de Munchon se produjo el corte de suministro de agua potable debido a la destruccion total de la red de acueducto.
					
					En la ciudad de Haeju y el distrito de Jaeryong de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur se destruyeron total o parcialmente varias  viviendas y en el distrito de Unchon se anegaron muchas tierras cultivables.
					
					Como consecuencias del tifon no.7, se observaron el dia 19 en las zonas costeras orientales las lluvias torrenciales, vientos fuertes y hasta marejada.
					
					Se reportaron mas de 200 mm de precipitaciones en la ciudad Kim Chaek de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, la ciudad de Munchon y el distrito de Chonnae de la provincia de Kangwon y la comunidad de Sudong de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					
					Especificamente, el pluviometro marco 66 mm y 64 mm en la ciudad Kim Chaek en los horarios 15-18 y 21-24; 54 mm y 72 mm en el distrito de Chonnae en los horarios 10 -11 y 12-15; 52 mm y 69 mm en la comunidad de Sudong en los horarios 9:20-11:50 y 12-15, respectivamente.
					
					El mismo dia, hicieron vientos fuertes con mas de 10-18m/s en la ciudad de Wonsan y el distrito de Kosong de la provincia de Kangwon y las ciudades de Hamhung, Sinpho y Tanchon y el distrito de Riwon de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur y se observo marejada en zonas costeras.
